trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Ensenada
There were no other sightings in Ensenada on or around July 13th 1996
Summary: The Object rose above the beach Spinning and shinning with Bright yellow lights.
divs: Sighting DetailsIn the summer of 1996,we took our anual trip to mexico to ride motor cycles.After a long day of riding Me and my brother inlaw had dinner in the back yard of his mothers house.This sits about two streets from the beach.It was july,about a week after the forth of july.so we finished up dinner and started to clean up our bikes.although its a week after the fourth of july,children are still lighting off fire works.So we can hear the popping.Sometimes we could see the sparks.So as we contnued to clean the Bikes, I was neeling down when I noticed a Bright Light Rising over the fence,bright yellow lights.I drew my brothers attention to the object.As we watched the obect in was spinning counter clock wise very fast When I first saw it I thought It was a Fire work,something that some one had thrown over the fence.I noticed that it wasnt falling but it kept rising.This object looked like a circle or disc shaped but the shape was black ecept for the lights.The lights shone like solid yellow beems commig from what looked like windows,all lined up along the side.The object kept spinning and rising at a high rate of speed until we couldnt see it any longer diappearing over the trees.We did not chase it or go looking for it.We just stood there looking at each other in dis belief.This Happened 12 years ago,but in my mind it like it happened yestrday.
